nodes.text: Mammals were a class of warm-blooded, usually hairy species that included the barghests, the wampas, the gundark, the falumpasets, the Cereans, banthas, the lonlans, the thwip, and the humans. Many non-sentient mammals were used as sources of food, transportation, protection, and even entertainment for the intelligent beings of the galaxy.
As mammals appear in almost every Star Wars work. The following is a list of media in which mammals are specifically referred to:
